recommendations: Add a meta description to the website's HTML header
Use clear and concise language in content and improve layout for better readability
Implement caching and content delivery network (CDN) to reduce latency
opportunities: Implement a meta description for search engine optimization
Optimize content for better readability and accessibility
Improve page loading speed to enhance user experience
risks: Missing meta description may negatively impact search engine rankings
High latency may lead to user frustration and decreased engagement
Inadequate accessibility may result in legal and reputational issues
